text: Charlie Chan in Shanghai is a 1935 American mystery movie directed by James Tinling and is the 12th movie in the Charlie Chan series. It stars Warner Oland, Irene Hervey, Russell Hicks, Keye Luke, Jon Hall, Halliwell Hobbes and was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * * Category:1935 movies Category:1930s mystery movies Category:American mystery movies Category:Movies directed by James Tinling Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies set in China Category:Charlie Chan
title: Charlie Chan in Shanghai
